DOC.brief_summary: This study assess effect food single dose Ondansetron take meal empty stomach .
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Study Anti Nausea Medication With Without Food ( EUR-1025 )
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study assess effect food pharmacokinetics single 24 mg dose Ondansetron administer novel modified-release capsule formulation feed fasting condition .
